description.zh-cn: 位于非洲南端的共和国，拥有三个首都：行政首都比勒陀利亚、立法首都开普敦、司法首都布隆方丹。该国拥有多元的种族与文化，被称为“彩虹之国”。南非是非洲经济最发达的国家之一，也是唯一曾自行发展核武器后又自愿销毁的国家。
description.en: A republic at the southern tip of Africa, with three capital cities: Pretoria (administrative), Cape Town (legislative), and Bloemfontein (judicial). Known as the 'Rainbow Nation' for its diverse ethnicities and cultures. It is one of Africa's most developed economies and the only country to have developed and then voluntarily dismantled its own nuclear weapons.

description.zh-cn: 1948年至1990年代初在南非实行的一项种族隔离制度，由国民党政府建立。该制度基于白人至上主义，对非白人种族进行系统性的歧视和压迫。
description.en: A system of institutionalised racial segregation that existed in South Africa from 1948 until the early 1990s, established by the National Party government. It was based on white supremacy and enforced systemic discrimination and oppression against non-white racial groups.

description.zh-cn: 南非的一个政党，主要由阿非利卡人支持。从1948年到1994年，该党是南非的执政党，并建立了种族隔离制度。
description.en: A political party in South Africa, primarily supported by Afrikaners. It was the governing party of South Africa from 1948 to 1994 and was responsible for implementing the system of apartheid.

nodes.id: 弗雷德里克·威廉·德克勒克

zh-cn: 弗雷德里克·威廉·德克勒克

description.zh-cn: 南非政治家，1989年至1994年担任南非国家总统。他领导了废除种族隔离制度的改革，并释放了纳尔逊·曼德拉。
description.en: A South African politician who served as State President of South Africa from 1989 to 1994. He led the reforms that ended the apartheid system and ordered the release of Nelson Mandela.

description.zh-cn: 南非反种族隔离革命家、政治领袖，1994年至1999年担任南非首位黑人总统。因反抗种族隔离制度而入狱27年。
description.en: A South African anti-apartheid revolutionary and political leader who served as the first black president of South Africa from 1994 to 1999. He was imprisoned for 27 years for his role in fighting apartheid.

description.zh-cn: 南非的执政党，自1994年种族隔离制度结束后一直掌权。最初是一个为争取黑人权利而成立的组织，在反种族隔离斗争中扮演了核心角色。
description.en: The governing party of South Africa since the end of apartheid in 1994. Originally founded to fight for the rights of black South Africans, it played a central role in the anti-apartheid struggle.

description.zh-cn: 南非历史上首次不分种族的民主选举，标志着种族隔离制度的正式结束。非洲人国民大会在该次选举中取得压倒性胜利。
description.en: The first non-racial democratic election in South Africa's history, marking the official end of apartheid. The African National Congress won a landslide victory.

description.zh-cn: 此次选举中，由丹尼尔·马兰领导的国民党获胜，标志着南非种族隔离制度的正式开始。
description.en: In this election, the National Party led by D. F. Malan won, marking the formal beginning of the apartheid system in South Africa.

description.zh-cn: 南非政治家，1948年至1954年担任南非总理。他的政府开始正式实施种族隔离政策。
description.en: A South African politician who served as the Prime Minister of South Africa from 1948 to 1954. His government began the formal implementation of apartheid policies.

description.zh-cn: 荷兰殖民地官员，于1652年代表荷兰东印度公司在好望角建立了开普敦，是欧洲人在南非的首个永久定居点。
description.en: A Dutch colonial administrator who, on behalf of the Dutch East India Company, founded Cape Town in 1652 at the Cape of Good Hope, which was the first permanent European settlement in South Africa.

description.zh-cn: 一家荷兰的特许公司，于17世纪在好望角建立了殖民地，作为其前往亚洲贸易船只的补给站。
description.en: A Dutch chartered company that established a colony at the Cape of Good Hope in the 17th century as a supply station for its trading ships en route to Asia.

description.zh-cn: 南非的立法首都，也是南非最古老的城市。由扬·范里贝克于1652年建立。
description.en: The legislative capital of South Africa and the country's oldest city. It was founded by Jan van Riebeeck in 1652.

description.zh-cn: 历史上最大的帝国，曾在1806年正式占领开普殖民地，并在两次布尔战争后控制了整个南非地区，最终于1910年建立了南非联邦。
description.en: The largest empire in history, which formally occupied the Cape Colony in 1806, controlled the entire South African region after the Boer Wars, and established the Union of South Africa in 1910.

description.zh-cn: 大英帝国与两个独立的布尔共和国（德兰士瓦共和国和奥兰治自由邦）之间的战争。战争以英国胜利告终，布尔共和国被吞并。
description.en: A war fought between the British Empire and the two independent Boer republics, the South African Republic (Transvaal Republic) and the Orange Free State. The war ended in a British victory and the annexation of the Boer republics.

description.zh-cn: 19世纪由布尔人（阿非利卡人）建立的独立共和国，在第二次布尔战争后被大英帝国吞并。
description.en: An independent republic established in the 19th century by the Boers (Afrikaners), which was annexed by the British Empire after the Second Boer War.

description.zh-cn: 19世纪由布尔人（阿非利卡人）建立的独立共和国，在第二次布尔战争后被大英帝国吞并。
description.en: An independent republic established in the 19th century by the Boers (Afrikaners), which was annexed by the British Empire after the Second Boer War.

description.zh-cn: 现代南非共和国的前身，由四个英国殖民地合并而成，是大英帝国的自治领。1961年改制为共和国。
description.en: The predecessor to the modern Republic of South Africa, formed by the unification of four British colonies as a dominion of the British Empire. It became a republic in 1961.

description.zh-cn: 英国国会通过的一项法案，旨在将开普殖民地、纳塔尔殖民地、德兰士瓦殖民地和奥兰治河殖民地合并为南非联邦。
description.en: An Act of the Parliament of the United Kingdom which created the Union of South Africa from the Cape Colony, Natal Colony, Transvaal Colony, and Orange River Colony.

description.zh-cn: 1994年种族隔离结束后成立的南非国家武装力量，由旧南非防卫军、反种族隔离组织的武装力量（如民族之矛）以及班图斯坦的防卫部队整合而成。
description.en: The national armed forces of South Africa, established after the end of apartheid in 1994. It was formed by integrating the old South African Defence Force, the armed wings of anti-apartheid movements (like Umkhonto we Sizwe), and the defence forces of the Bantustans.

description.zh-cn: 1948年大选中，丹尼尔·马兰领导下的国民党胜出并开始单独执政，为其推行种族隔离政策铺平了道路。
description.en: In the 1948 general election, the National Party under D. F. Malan won and began to govern alone, paving the way for its implementation of apartheid policies.

description.zh-cn: 国民党在1948年上台后，开始建立并系统性地实施种族隔离制度。
description.en: After coming to power in 1948, the National Party began to establish and systematically implement the system of apartheid.

description.zh-cn: 非洲人国民大会是反对种族隔离制度的主要力量，领导了长期的斗争以推翻该制度。
description.en: The African National Congress was the primary force opposing the apartheid system, leading a long struggle to overthrow it.

relationships.source: 弗雷德里克·威廉·德克勒克

description.zh-cn: 1990年，时任国家总统德克勒克宣布解除对反种族隔离组织的禁令，并开始废除种族隔离立法，最终结束了该制度。
description.en: In 1990, then-State President de Klerk announced the unbanning of anti-apartheid organizations and began repealing apartheid legislation, ultimately ending the system.

relationships.source: 弗雷德里克·威廉·德克勒克

description.zh-cn: 德克勒克政府释放了被监禁27年的纳尔逊·曼德拉，并与他就南非的民主过渡进行了谈判。
description.en: The de Klerk government released Nelson Mandela after 27 years of imprisonment and negotiated with him on South Africa's democratic transition.

description.zh-cn: 在首次不分种族的选举中，纳尔逊·曼德拉领导的非洲人国民大会获胜，曼德拉随后成为南非首位黑人总统。
description.en: In the first non-racial election, the African National Congress led by Nelson Mandela won, and Mandela subsequently became South Africa's first black president.

description.zh-cn: 纳尔逊·曼德拉是非洲人国民大会的杰出领导人，并代表该党当选为南非总统。
description.en: Nelson Mandela was a prominent leader of the African National Congress and was elected President of South Africa representing the party.

description.zh-cn: 扬·范里贝克代表荷兰东印度公司在好望角建立了补给站。
description.en: Jan van Riebeeck established a supply station at the Cape of Good Hope on behalf of the Dutch East India Company.

description.zh-cn: 1652年4月6日，扬·范里贝克在好望角附近登陆并建立了开普敦，作为船只补给的中途站。
description.en: On April 6, 1652, Jan van Riebeeck landed near the Cape of Good Hope and founded Cape Town as a midway supply station for ships.

description.zh-cn: 第二次布尔战争以英国胜利告终，德兰士瓦共和国被吞并，其独立地位被终结。
description.en: The Second Boer War ended in a British victory, leading to the annexation of the Transvaal Republic and the end of its independence.

description.zh-cn: 第二次布尔战争以英国胜利告终，奥兰治自由邦被吞并，其独立地位被终结。
description.en: The Second Boer War ended in a British victory, leading to the annexation of the Orange Free State and the end of its independence.

description.zh-cn: 在第二次布尔战争期间，大英帝国与德兰士瓦共和国是敌对双方。
description.en: During the Second Boer War, the British Empire and the Transvaal Republic were opposing sides.

description.zh-cn: 在第二次布尔战争期间，大英帝国与奥兰治自由邦是敌对双方。
description.en: During the Second Boer War, the British Empire and the Orange Free State were opposing sides.

description.zh-cn: 英国国会通过的《1909年南非法案》促成了南非联邦的建立。
description.en: The South Africa Act 1909, passed by the British Parliament, led to the establishment of the Union of South Africa.

description.zh-cn: 民族之矛是非洲人国民大会的军事分支，为实现其政治目标而进行武装斗争。
description.en: Umkhonto we Sizwe was the military wing of the African National Congress, conducting armed struggle to achieve its political goals.

description.zh-cn: 1994年，民族之矛的成员被整合进新成立的南非国防军。
description.en: In 1994, members of Umkhonto we Sizwe were integrated into the newly formed South African National Defence Force.
